mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (reservIdx, empCode, empName, title, cabinet, regDate, reservDate, startTime, endTime) VALUES(reservIdx_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empCode}, #{empName}, #{title}, #{cabinet}, SYSDATE, #{reservDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reservation WHERE reservationIdx = #{reservationIdx} AND empCode = #{empCode}
